solution: 设 $S=\sum_{k=1}^{100} a_k^2 a_{k+1}$, 其中, 定义 $a_{101}=a_1, a_{102}=a_2$. 由柯西不等式及均值不等式得 $(3 S)^2=\left[\sum_{k=1}^{100} a_{k+1}\left(a_k^2+2 a_{k+1} a_{k+2}\right)\right]^2 \leqslant\left(\sum_{k=1}^{100} a_{k+1}^2\right) \sum_{k=1}^{100}\left(a_k^2+2 a_{k+1} a_{k+2}\right)^2 =1 \times \sum_{k=1}^{100}\left(a_k^2+2 a_{k+1} a_{k+2}\right)^2=\sum_{k=1}^{100}\left(a_k^4+4 a_k^2 a_{k+1} a_{k+2}+4 a_{k+1}^2 a_{k+2}^2\right) \leqslant \sum_{k=1}^{100}\left[a_k^4+\right. \left.2 a_k^2\left(a_{k+1}^2+a_{k+2}^2\right)+4 a_{k+1}^2 a_{k+2}^2\right]=\sum_{k=1}^{100}\left(a_k^4+6 a_k^2 a_{k+1}^2+2 a_k^2 a_{k+2}^2\right)$. 又 $\sum_{k=1}^{100}\left(a_k^4+2 a_k^2 a_{k+1}^2\right. \left.+2 a_k^2 a_{k+2}^2\right) \leqslant\left(\sum_{k=1}^{100} a_k^2\right)^2, \sum_{k=1}^{100} a_k^2 a_{k+1}^2 \leqslant\left(\sum_{i=1}^{50} a_{2 i-1}^2\right)\left(\sum_{j=1}^{50} a_{2 j}^2\right)$, 故 $(3 S)^2 \leqslant\left(\sum_{k=1}^{100} a_k^2\right)^2+ 4\left(\sum_{i=1}^{50} a_{2 i-1}^2\right)\left(\sum_{j=1}^{50} a_{2 j}^2\right) \leqslant 1+\left(\sum_{i=1}^{50} a_{2 i-1}^2+\sum_{j=1}^{50} a_{2 j}^2\right)^2=2$. 从而, $S \leqslant \frac{\sqrt{2}}{3} \approx 0.4714< 0.48=\frac{12}{25}$.
